title: Maestro Error
body:
There was an error with maestro. League of legends will now exit. Please try restarting the client.

WHY DOES THIS KEEP HAPPENING!! HALP!! :( AFTER ALMOST EVERY GAME!!!

:D Thanks

replies.body:
hey so i still keep getting this error. 

I'm on a new comp and i have kapersky antivirus. its like every game just about now and it happens randomly. i just dodged a queue because of it.

SOMEONE  PLEASE HELP :(

I've also repaired and re-installed countless times.
Every game? Have you tried repairing your client?
